casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jesse C. SANTIFORT 108P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 18, 2017 Walter S. Webster, Attorney at Law, Goldsboro, Vernon K. Stewart, Attorney at Law, Dunn, for Santifort, Jesse C. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of April 2017 by State of NC to Amend Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of April 2017."
